title: Trying to reconnect
body:
I don't know if it is just me but since yesterday I have been disconnecting from games for some reason.  Suddenly, my screen freezes and says "trying to reconnect" and after 20sec(?) it comes back to normal but this happens like every 7-10mins.
It is not my internet problem because my Spotify keeps running(online) and I can still browse.
Do I have to re-download the game....? 

Riot the great lords helps this poor player.

replies.body: It's important to get this fixed up right away so you don't start to get penalties for disconnecting from games.  It sounds like you are having a bit of a network problem staying connected to the game server specifically, even if you can use other parts of the net.  Go through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this resolved for good.  Let me know if you have any questions!
